DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to compare dobutamine stress echocardiography (DES) with computed tomography coronary angiography (CTCA) in patients with undergoing intermediate to high risk noncardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Accuracy of Coronary CT and Dobutamine Stress Echocardiography in Patient Undergoing Non-cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1. Elective surgery 2.
